metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11100 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The decompileSETTARGET function in decompile.c in libming through 0.4.8 mishandles cases where the header indicates a file size greater than the actual size, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Segmentation fault and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
